content: Hi, I'm planning a trip to New York City next week and I want to know if there's a good hospital near my hotel.
Based on your location, I recommend the New York-Presbyterian Hospital. It's one of the top-rated hospitals in the city.
That sounds great, but what about insurance? Can you tell me which insurance providers are accepted?
New York-Presbyterian Hospital has partnerships with several major insurance providers, including UnitedHealthcare and Cigna.
Okay, got it. What's the best way to get a copy of my medical records?
You can request your medical records by contacting our patient portal or by mail.
